abstract: Education Dept will investigate Baylor for its handling of Title IX sexual assault cases against its football players.

headline.print_headline: Football; Baylor Faces Federal Inquiry on Title IX
headline.main: Baylor Under Federal Investigation Over Possible Title IX Violations

snippet: The inquiry, by the Department of Education’s Office for Civil Rights, will examine whether Baylor violated the law in its handling of sexual assault claims on campus....
lead_paragraph: The inquiry, by the Department of Education’s Office for Civil Rights, will examine whether Baylor violated the law in its handling of sexual assault claims on campus.
